con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="BRMS" targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/brms/v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" <wsdl:import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/payment/v1" location="../../xsd/brms.xsd"/> <xsd:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/brms/v1"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../../xsd/brms.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </xsd:types> <wsdl:message name="headerRq"> <wsdl:part name="headerRq" element="tns:headerRq"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="headerRs"> <wsdl:part name="headerRs" element="tns:headerRs"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DefineShipmentCompany_in"> <wsdl:part name="DefineShipmentCompanyRq" element="tns:DefineShipmentCompanyRq"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DefineShipmentCompany_out"> <wsdl:part name="DefineShipmentCompanyRs" element="tns:DefineShipmentCompanyRs"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DefineShipmentCompany_fault1"> <wsdl:part name="exceptionGeneric" element="excgen:exceptionGeneric"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_in"> <wsdl:part name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRq" element="tns:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRq"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_out"> <wsdl:part name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRs" element="tns:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRs"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_fault1"> <wsdl:part name="exceptionGeneric" element="excgen:exceptionGeneric"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="BRMSPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="defineShipmentCompany"> <wsdl:input name="DefineShipmentCompany_Input" message="tns:DefineShipmentCompany_in"/> <wsdl:output name="DefineShipmentCompany_Output" message="tns:DefineShipmentCompany_out"/> <wsdl:fault name="DefineShipmentCompany_Fault" message="tns:DefineShipmentCompany_fault1"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="validateAmountAccordingCustomerClass"> <wsdl:input name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Input" message="tns:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_in"/> <wsdl:output name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Output" message="tns:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_out"/> <wsdl:fault name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Fault" message="tns:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_fault1"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="BRMSBinding" type="tns:BRMSPortType"> <soap12:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="defineShipmentCompany"> <soap12:operation soapAction="defineShipmentCompany"/> <wsdl:input name="DefineShipmentCompany_Input"> <soap12:header message="tns:headerRq" part="headerRq" use="literal"/> <soap12:body parts="DefineShipmentCompanyRq" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="DefineShipmentCompany_Output"> <soap12:header message="tns:headerRs" part="headerRs" use="literal"/> <soap12:body parts="DefineShipmentCompanyRs" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="DefineShipmentCompany_Fault"> <soap12:header message="tns:headerRs" part="headerRs" use="literal"/> <soap12:fault name="DefineShipmentCompany_Fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="validateAmountAccordingCustomerClass"> <soap12:operation soapAction="validateAmountAccordingCustomerClass"/> <wsdl:input name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Input"> <soap12:header message="tns:headerRq" part="headerRq" use="literal"/> <soap12:body parts="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRq" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Output"> <soap12:header message="tns:headerRs" part="headerRs" use="literal"/> <soap12:body parts="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRs" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Fault"> <soap12:header message="tns:headerRs" part="headerRs" use="literal"/> <soap12:fault name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClass_Fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="BRMSService"> <wsdl:port name="BRMSPort" binding="tns:BRMSBinding"> <soap12:address location="http://localhost:9191/soap"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric"> <element name="exceptionGeneric" type="tns:ExceptionGeneric"/> <complexType name="ExceptionGeneric"> <sequence> <element name="code" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="description" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="subCode" type="tns:ExceptionGeneric" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 sp1 (http://www.altova.com) by End User (free.org)--> <schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/brms/v1" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:h="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/common/headers" xmlns:sc="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/shipmentcompany" xmlns:pvc="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/productvendorcompany" xmlns:adr="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/address" xmlns:cus="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/customer" xmlns:order="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order" xmlns:m="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/brms/v1"> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/common/headers" schemaLocation="../../../Common/Headers.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money" schemaLocation="../../../Common/Money.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/shipmentcompany" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/ShipmentCompany.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/productvendorcompany" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/ProductVendorCompany.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/address" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/Address.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/customer" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/Customer.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/Order.xsd"/> <element name="headerRq" type="h:HeaderRqType"/> <element name="headerRs" type="h:HeaderRsType"/> <element name="DefineShipmentCompanyRq"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="localization" type="tns:LocalizationType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="vendor" type="tns:VendorType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="DefineShipmentCompanyRs"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="shipmentCompany" type="tns:ShipmentCompanyType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRq"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="customer" type="tns:CustomerType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="order" type="tns:OrderType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRs"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="valid" type="boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <complexType name="LocalizationType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="adr:Address"> <sequence> <element name="country" type="adr:CountryTypeEnum" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="VendorType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="pvc:ProductVendorCompany"> <sequence> <element name="productVendorCompanyId" type="pvc:ProductVendorCompanyTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ShipmentCompanyType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="sc:ShipmentCompany"> <sequence> <element name="shipmentCompanyId" type="sc:ShipmentCompanyTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="CustomerType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="cus:Customer"> <sequence> <element name="customerClass" type="cus:CustomerClassTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="OrderType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="order:OrderInfo_v1.0"> <sequence> <element name="orderPrice" type="m:MoneyGeneric" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/common/headers" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/common/headers"> <complexType name="HeaderType"> <sequence> <element name="transactionID" type="date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="date" type="date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="loginUser" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="code" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="message" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="HeaderRqType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="tns:HeaderType"> <sequence> <element name="transactionID" type="date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="date" type="date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="loginUser" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="HeaderRsType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="tns:HeaderType"> <sequence> <element name="code" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="message" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money"> <element name="money" type="this:MoneyGeneric"/> <simpleType name="MoneyGeneric"> <restriction base="decimal"> <fractionDigits value="2"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 sp1 (http://www.altova.com) by End User (free.org)--> <schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/shipmentcompany" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/shipmentcompany"> <complexType name="ShipmentCompany"> <sequence> <element name="shipmentCompanyId" type="this:ShipmentCompanyTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="ShipmentCompanyTypeEnum"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="DHL"/> <enumeration value="SERVIENTREGA"/> <enumeration value="DEPRISA"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/productvendorcompany" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/productvendorcompany"> <complexType name="ProductVendorCompany"> <sequence> <element name="productVendorCompanyId" type="tns:ProductVendorCompanyTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="ProductVendorCompanyTypeEnum"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="SONY"/> <enumeration value="RS"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 sp1 (http://www.altova.com) by End User (free.org)--> <schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/address" elementFormDefault="unqualified" type="tns:CountryTypeEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="state" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="city" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="neighborhood" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="street" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="zipcode" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="CountryTypeEnum"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="AL"/> <enumeration value="DZ"/> <enumeration value="AR"/> <enumeration value="AU"/> <enumeration value="AT"/> <enumeration value="BH"/> <enumeration value="BY"/> <enumeration value="BE"/> <enumeration value="BO"/> <enumeration value="BA"/> <enumeration value="BR"/> <enumeration value="BG"/> <enumeration value="CA"/> <enumeration value="CL"/> <enumeration value="CN"/> <enumeration value="CO"/> <enumeration value="CR"/> <enumeration value="HR"/> <enumeration value="CY"/> <enumeration value="CZ"/> <enumeration value="DK"/> <enumeration value="DO"/> <enumeration value="EC"/> <enumeration value="EG"/> <enumeration value="SV"/> <enumeration value="EE"/> <enumeration value="FI"/> <enumeration value="FR"/> <enumeration value="DE"/> <enumeration value="GR"/> <enumeration value="GT"/> <enumeration value="HN"/> <enumeration value="HK"/> <enumeration value="HU"/> <enumeration value="IS"/> <enumeration value="IN"/> <enumeration value="ID"/> <enumeration value="IQ"/> <enumeration value="IE"/> <enumeration value="IL"/> <enumeration value="IT"/> <enumeration value="JP"/> <enumeration value="JO"/> <enumeration value="KW"/> <enumeration value="LV"/> <enumeration value="LB"/> <enumeration value="LT"/> <enumeration value="LU"/> <enumeration value="MK"/> <enumeration value="MY"/> <enumeration value="MT"/> <enumeration value="MX"/> <enumeration value="MA"/> <enumeration value="NL"/> <enumeration value="NZ"/> <enumeration value="NI"/> <enumeration value="NO"/> <enumeration value="OM"/> <enumeration value="PA"/> <enumeration value="PY"/> <enumeration value="PE"/> <enumeration value="PH"/> <enumeration value="PL"/> <enumeration value="PT"/> <enumeration value="PR"/> <enumeration value="QA"/> <enumeration value="RO"/> <enumeration value="RU"/> <enumeration value="SA"/> <enumeration value="CS"/> <enumeration value="SG"/> <enumeration value="SK"/> <enumeration value="SI"/> <enumeration value="ZA"/> <enumeration value="ES"/> <enumeration value="SD"/> <enumeration value="SE"/> <enumeration value="CH"/> <enumeration value="SY"/> <enumeration value="TW"/> <enumeration value="TH"/> <enumeration value="TN"/> <enumeration value="TR"/> <enumeration value="UA"/> <enumeration value="AE"/> <enumeration value="GB"/> <enumeration value="US"/> <enumeration value="UY"/> <enumeration value="VE"/> <enumeration value="VN"/> <enumeration value="YE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/customer" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/customer"> <complexType name="Customer"> <sequence> <element name="name" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="lastName" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="customerClass" type="tns:CustomerClassTypeEnum" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="CustomerClassTypeEnum"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="PLATINO"/> <enumeration value="DORADO"/> <enumeration value="PLATEADO"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pvc="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/productvendorcompany" xmlns:sc="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/shipmentcompany" xmlns:item="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" xmlns:money="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order"> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/productvendorcompany" schemaLocation="ProductVendorCompany.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/shipmentcompany" schemaLocation="ShipmentCompany.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" schemaLocation="Item.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money" schemaLocation="../Common/Money.xsd"/> <!--Product Entity--> <complexType name="Order_v1.0"> <sequence> <element name="orderInfo" type="tns:OrderInfo_v1.0" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="productVendorCompanyInfo" type="pvc:ProductVendorCompany" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="shippingCompanyInfo" type="sc:ShipmentCompany" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="OrderInfo_v1.0"> <sequence> <element name="orderId" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="items" type="item:Item" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="orderPrice" type="money:MoneyGeneric" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ShipmentInfo_v1.0"> <sequence> <element name="shippingCompanyInfo" type="sc:ShipmentCompany" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" xmlns:money="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money"> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/money" schemaLocation="../Common/Money.xsd"/> <complexType name="Item"> <sequence> <element name="itemId" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="itemName" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="prodID" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="productName" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="partNumber" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="itemDescription" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="price" type="money:MoneyGeneric" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="quantity" type="long" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:v1="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/brms/v1">\r <soap:Header>\r <v1:headerRq>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: date-->\r <transactionID>?</transactionID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: date-->\r <date>?</date>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: string-->\r <loginUser>?</loginUser>\r </v1:headerRq>\r </soap:Header>\r <soap:Body>\r <v1:DefineShipmentCompanyRq>\r <localization>\r <!--type: CountryTypeEnum - enumeration: [AL,DZ,AR,AU,AT,BH,BY,BE,BO,BA,BR,BG,CA,CL,CN,CO,CR,HR,CY,CZ,DK,DO,EC,EG,SV,EE,FI,FR,DE,GR,GT,HN,HK,HU,IS,IN,ID,IQ,IE,IL,IT,JP,JO,KW,LV,LB,LT,LU,MK,MY,MT,MX,MA,NL,NZ,NI,NO,OM,PA,PY,PE,PH,PL,PT,PR,QA,RO,RU,SA,CS,SG,SK,SI,ZA,ES,SD,SE,CH,SY,TW,TH,TN,TR,UA,AE,GB,US,UY,VE,VN,YE]-->\r <country>?</country>\r </localization>\r <vendor>\r <!--type: ProductVendorCompanyTypeEnum - enumeration: [SONY,RS]-->\r <productVendorCompanyId>?</productVendorCompanyId>\r </vendor>\r </v1:DefineShipmentCompanyRq>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:v1="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/brms/v1">\r <soap:Header>\r <v1:headerRq>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: date-->\r <transactionID>?</transactionID>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: date-->\r <date>?</date>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: string-->\r <loginUser>?</loginUser>\r </v1:headerRq>\r </soap:Header>\r <soap:Body>\r <v1:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRq>\r <customer>\r <!--type: CustomerClassTypeEnum - enumeration: [PLATINO,DORADO,PLATEADO]-->\r <customerClass>?</customerClass>\r </customer>\r <order>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: MoneyGeneric-->\r <orderPrice>?</orderPrice>\r </order>\r </v1:ValidateAmountAccordingCustomerClassRq>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>
